# minimalIdentifier

**Instance Property**

Returns a BCP-47 identifier in a minimalist form. Script and region may be omitted. For example, “zh-TW”, “en”

## Declaration

```swift
var minimalIdentifier: String { get }
```
title: minimalIdentifier
